name: Very Interesting Chess
description:
Basically chess, just a bit more chaotic...

Let's hope those billiard sessions pay off!

--------- CONCEPT ---------

Theme : Power            Limitation : 5 Colors

-------- GAMEPLAY --------

Just try to drag your chess pieces and throw them somewhere in the board.

You can try to block or open paths, do some cool tricks and push other pieces down from the board. Right now their actual chess logic is not engrained to the game because I am lazy.

So just have fun and try to take down their king!

-------- CONTROLS --------

Left Mouse Click Drag :  Throw Pieces

RightMouse Click Drag : Rotate Camera

-------- USED ASSETS --------

Background music is from Vasco Grossmann - Calm Bay

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/music/orchestral/fantasy-music-72886

And some of the SFX are from Cafofo.

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/foley/footsteps-sound-pack-...

Other than that, every art asset is made by me.

There is not much to be honest :)
